text.autoconfig.sfcr.title: SuperFancyClouds: Refabricated
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.enableWeathe: Let the clouds density change with weather.
Height of the cloud on the Y-axis. May NOT accurate.
It will invalid when other mod which 
modify cloud height are installed (such as Sodium-Extra).
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.cloudLayerTh: §4May cause weird issue if set too high§r
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.cloudRenderD:
Ignored when "Fit to View" is enabled.
§4May cause weird issue if set too high§r
Cloud Render Distance Fit to View
"Cloud Render Distance" will be ignore when enable it.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.enableFog.@T: Use fog to transition cloud to view boundary.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.fogAutoDista:
Fog distance will auto adjust depends on view distance.
"Fog Distance" Value will be ignored.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.fogMinDistan:
The distance from fog to player. Higher and farther.
Will swap each other if bigger than END.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.fogMaxDistan:
The distance from fog to player. Higher and farther.
Will swap each other if smaller than START.
